txt.en: Every day there is something to do during the Anniversary Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Anniversary Festival activities for three days!
Every day there is something to do during the Anniversary Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Anniversary Festival activities for three days!
Waldo Rumble can be found near the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should talk to Waldo Rumble.

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Festival takes place to celebrate a very special occasion. Partake in the festivities to help mark this milestone with fireworks and good-cheer!\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>(There are nine days worth of 'A Yearly Yield' and 'Another Lovely Year' participation quests. Plan accordingly!)</rgb>

'Goodness, you certainly have given it your all this year! Thanks to all your hard work, the festival went off without a hitch!\n\n'I hope to see you next year, when I'll have a whole new set of gifts ready for you!'

'Welcome, welcome!

'If you're here for the Anniversary Festival, you have come to the right place! I'd recommend you look around and participate in many of the fun activities. Plenty to do!

'For those folks that participate in many of our activities, there might just be a reward in store for you, so get out there!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: this quest cannot be cancelled.</rgb>
Every day there is something to do during the Anniversary Festival.  Come and join everyone and participate in many Anniversary Festival activities for three days!
